annotations:
TELiX MSG: 0ZVCJ-00 19/08/24 10:38 +03:00
EXCL
- MV Seacon Bangkok - Imabari 40/'24 - Open Puerto Limon, Costa Rica 05/10 Sep
ETA SW Pass 09/14 Sep
ETA North Brazil 12/17 Sep
- AFF 1
- 2x25 mts Coils
- Box Shape 2/3/4
+++
MV Seacon Bangkok
built 2024 by Imabari,
40,540 mts dwat at abt 10.49m ssw,
TPC 52
Liberia flag, class NKK
loa 182.93 m / beam 31.00 m / 5 ho/ha
grt abt 24,992 / nrt abt 12,883
grain / bale capacity  abt 50,207 cbm / abt 48,474 cbm
Cranes 4 x 30tons
CO2 fitted / A60 fitted
s/c:       14.0kts(b)/13.5kts(l) on 16.00(b)/17.00(l) mts vlsfo
eco (wog): 12.5kts(b)/12.0kts(l) on 12.50(b)/13.50(l) mts vlsfo
: 2.5 mt vlsfo at port/idle
: 5.5 mt vlsfo when cranes working
: 0.1 mt lsmgo at sea/port
All dets abt
(Ref: Panos)
+ + +
Best Regards,
Chartering Dept.
Phone : +30 216 202 5700
